Package gr.interamerican.bo2.legacy

Interface Summary
LegacyPoAdapter<P extends PersistentObject> Adapter to a legacy Bo Persistent object.
 

Class Summary
LegacyBoUtils Creates a Bo-1.5 provider given a Bo-2 provider type.
LegacyOperationAdapter Adapter to a legacy operation.
LegacyPwAdapter<P extends > PersistenceWorker based on a legacy persistence worker.
LegacyQueryAdapter Adapts a legacy Bo query to Bo2.
LegacyQuestionAdapter<A> Adapts a legacy Bo question to Bo2.
LegacyWorkerAdapter Wrapper around a legacy (Bo1) worker.
